UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY!

DIY Trends

Whether Tik-tok made you do it, you just want to recreate that cute sundress in another color and I'm sure the ideas are infinite so book now and let's get sewing!

Beginner Garments

1-on-1 instruction on basic garments for beginner and returning sewists. Purses, shirts, skirts, and more...you're one stitch away from your next creative masterpiece!

Crafting Crosstraining

ACCEPTING ALL LEVELS! This course is for the Cricut and Silhouette community, but all are welcome to join. From software, design, simple sewing, and branding, this cross training is a must see!
